name: HEX.COM DIAMOND
description: Richard Heart bought the world's largest cut diamond. It's billions of years old, weighs 555.55 carat and has 55 facets. It celebrates HEXican cultural heritage, as the longest HEX mining that can take place is 5,555 days, and some people have "5555" tattoos. Richard named it "The HEX.COM Diamond". DMND is a tokenized embodiment of the diamond and by extension the HEXican culture. It is the official pulsechain memecoin with a fixed supply of 5,555,555,555.
